subject: Television
Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Matt Lauer’s travails at Torrey Pines will be part of a one-hour taped special NBC that will broadcast next Sunday as a lead-in to the United States Open’s final round.
snippet: Matt Lauer’s travails at Torrey Pines will be part of a one-hour taped special NBC that will broadcast next Sunday as a lead-in to the United States Open’s final round.
